query:
SELECT 
                e.id,
                e.display_name,
                e.attributes,
                e.created_at,
                e.updated_at
            FROM entities e
            JOIN classes c ON e.class_id = c.id
            WHERE c.name = 'AlertRule'
              AND e.deleted_at IS NULL
            ORDER BY (e.attributes->>'total_triggers')::INTEGER DESC NULLS LAST
